list.description: Rooms at the resort hotel are equipped with air conditioning, desk, kettle, minibar, safe, flat-screen TV, balcony and private bathroom with shower. Towels and bed linen are also provided in each room. A buffet breakfast is served every morning.

Our Deluxe Suite offers a spacious and sophisticated space with high ceilings and large windows that capture the Caribbean breeze. Designed for those seeking an unforgettable stay in the heart of Cartagena.
An avant-garde space that combines original stone walls with contemporary design. Ideal for creative minds who wish to immerse themselves in the history of the city with all the modern comforts.

footer.description: An architectural jewel in the heart of Cartagena de Indias, where medieval luxury meets modern comfort for an unforgettable stay.
